A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Utter Garbage\, what a waste of time.  30 odd years waiting for this rubbish \, crap all over the franchise and lore\,  massive plot holes\, stupid logic\, just throw all the setup from the last movie to the curb \, i hate this POS movie.  Shame on everyone involved in making this. You had no respect for the previous 6 movies\, and although the prequels were not great they were still Star Wars movies.  This is not.
